channel.title: New & Upcoming Features on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in New & Upcoming Features on TechnoStreet

item.title: ChromeOS “Privacy Hub” icons on device shelf will let you toggle access to camera, mic, more
item.description: ChromeOS “Privacy Hub” icons on device shelf will let you toggle access to camera, mic, more Earlier this year, ChromeOS began prepping what’s known as the ‘Privacy Hub‘ – a one-stop shop for all of your device’s privacy and security options.
